summary: This is a court notification from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals regarding the case United States v. Epstein. It confirms the issuance of a certified copy of a mandate order, dated August 21, 2019, determining an appeal to the Southern District of New York (SDNY). The notice includes electronic mailing information for the attorneys of record.

persons.name: Martin G. Weinberg
persons.context: Listed as an attorney of record to receive electronic notice of the court's mandate issuance in the case United States v. Epstein.

persons.name: Reid Weingarten
persons.context: Listed as an attorney of record to receive electronic notice of the court's mandate issuance in the case United States v. Epstein.

connections.description: Both are listed as attorneys of record receiving notice for the same case, United States v. Epstein.

events.title: Appellate Mandate Issued
events.description: The Second Circuit Court of Appeals issued a certified copy of an order determining an appeal and sent the mandate to the Southern District of New York (SDNY).

keyFacts: The document is a court notification for case 19-2221, United States of America v. Epstein.
A certified copy of a mandate order was issued by the Second Circuit on August 21, 2019, determining an appeal to the SDNY.
Attorneys Martin G. Weinberg and Reid Weingarten are listed as recipients of electronic notice for this filing.
